description.zh-cn: 南宋至清朝的行政区划，由安庆军升格而来。元朝时曾改为安庆路、宁江府，后复名。清朝时为安徽省省会，辛亥革命后被废除。
description.en: An administrative division from the Southern Song to the Qing dynasty, upgraded from Anqing Jun. It was briefly renamed Anqing Lu and Ningjiang Fu during the Yuan dynasty before its name was restored. It served as the provincial capital of Anhui during the Qing dynasty and was abolished after the Xinhai Revolution.

description.zh-cn: 中国历史上的一个朝代，于1195年设立安庆府。
description.en: A Chinese dynasty that established Anqing Fu in 1195.

description.zh-cn: 中国的省级行政区，其名称来源于安庆府和徽州府。
description.en: A province of China, its name is derived from Anqing Fu and Huizhou Fu.

description.zh-cn: 清朝安徽省的最高军政长官，驻地在安庆府，因此也被称为安庆巡抚。
description.en: The highest military and political official of Anhui Province during the Qing Dynasty, stationed in Anqing Fu, hence also known as the Anqing Governor.

description.zh-cn: 清朝安徽省下辖的一个府，与安庆府同为“安徽”省名的来源。
description.en: A prefecture in Anhui Province during the Qing Dynasty, which, along with Anqing Fu, is the origin of the name 'Anhui'.

description.zh-cn: 唐朝至南宋的行政区划，安庆府的前身，在升为府前被称为安庆军。
description.en: An administrative division from the Tang to the Southern Song dynasty, the predecessor of Anqing Fu. It was known as Anqing Jun before being promoted to a Fu (prefecture).

description.zh-cn: 安庆府的下辖县及首县，也曾是安庆府的早期治所。
description.en: A county under the jurisdiction of Anqing Fu and its chief county, which also served as the early seat of government for Anqing Fu.

description.zh-cn: 安徽省的县级市，是历史上怀宁县的所在地。
description.en: A county-level city in Anhui Province, the historical location of Huaining County.

description.zh-cn: 安徽省下辖的地级市，安庆府于1260年将治所迁至此地。
description.en: A prefecture-level city in Anhui Province, where Anqing Fu moved its seat of government in 1260.

description.zh-cn: 中国历史上的一个朝代，于1277年将安庆府升为安庆路。
description.en: A Chinese dynasty that promoted Anqing Fu to Anqing Lu in 1277.

description.zh-cn: 元朝的行政区划，由安庆府改制而来，后被朱元璋改为宁江府。
description.en: An administrative division of the Yuan Dynasty, converted from Anqing Fu, and later changed to Ningjiang Fu by Zhu Yuanzhang.

description.zh-cn: 明朝开国皇帝，曾将安庆路改为宁江府，后又恢复为安庆府。
description.en: The founding emperor of the Ming Dynasty, who changed Anqing Lu to Ningjiang Fu and later restored it to Anqing Fu.

description.zh-cn: 元末朱元璋设立的行政区划，由安庆路改名而来，仅存在一年后复为安庆府。
description.en: An administrative division established by Zhu Yuanzhang at the end of the Yuan Dynasty, renamed from Anqing Lu. It existed for only one year before being restored to Anqing Fu.

description.zh-cn: 明清时期安庆府的下辖县之一。
description.en: One of the counties under the jurisdiction of Anqing Fu during the Ming and Qing dynasties.

description.zh-cn: 明清时期安庆府的下辖县之一。
description.en: One of the counties under the jurisdiction of Anqing Fu during the Ming and Qing dynasties.

description.zh-cn: 明清时期安庆府的下辖县之一。
description.en: One of the counties under the jurisdiction of Anqing Fu during the Ming and Qing dynasties.

description.zh-cn: 明清时期安庆府的下辖县之一。
description.en: One of the counties under the jurisdiction of Anqing Fu during the Ming and Qing dynasties.

description.zh-cn: 明清时期安庆府的下辖县之一。
description.en: One of the counties under the jurisdiction of Anqing Fu during the Ming and Qing dynasties.

description.zh-cn: 清朝初年设立的省份，安庆府曾为其下辖府之一。后分为安徽、江苏两省。
description.en: A province established in the early Qing Dynasty, of which Anqing Fu was one of its subordinate prefectures. It was later divided into Anhui and Jiangsu provinces.

description.zh-cn: 清朝第四位皇帝，在其统治时期江南省被分设为安徽省和江苏省。
description.en: The fourth emperor of the Qing Dynasty, during whose reign Jiangnan Province was divided into Anhui and Jiangsu provinces.

description.zh-cn: 清朝时期的安徽省，由江南省分设而来，以安庆府为省会。
description.en: Anhui Province during the Qing Dynasty, established from the division of Jiangnan Province, with Anqing Fu as its capital.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国初年的一项行政区划改革，该改革导致了安庆府等传统府级行政单位的废除。
description.en: An administrative redistricting reform in the early years of the Republic of China, which led to the abolition of traditional prefecture-level administrative units such as Anqing Fu.

description.zh-cn: 南宋于庆元元年（1195年）将安庆军升格设置安庆府。
description.en: The Southern Song Dynasty established Anqing Fu by promoting Anqing Jun in 1195 (the first year of the Qingyuan era).

description.zh-cn: 安庆府由安庆军（原舒州）升格而来。
description.en: Anqing Fu was upgraded from Anqing Jun (formerly Shuzhou).

description.zh-cn: 元朝于至元十四年（1277年）将安庆府升为安庆路。
description.en: The Yuan Dynasty promoted Anqing Fu to Anqing Lu in 1277.

description.zh-cn: 元朝时期，安庆府被升格并改制为安庆路。
description.en: During the Yuan Dynasty, Anqing Fu was promoted and reorganized into Anqing Lu.

description.zh-cn: 朱元璋于至正二十一年（1361年）将安庆路改为宁江府。
description.en: Zhu Yuanzhang changed Anqing Lu to Ningjiang Fu in 1361.

description.zh-cn: 1361年，安庆路被朱元璋改名为宁江府，次年复名。
description.en: In 1361, Anqing Lu was renamed Ningjiang Fu by Zhu Yuanzhang, and its original name was restored the following year.

description.zh-cn: 朱元璋于1362年将宁江府恢复为安庆府之名。
description.en: Zhu Yuanzhang restored the name of Ningjiang Fu back to Anqing Fu in 1362.

description.zh-cn: 1362年，宁江府被恢复旧名安庆府。
description.en: In 1362, Ningjiang Fu was restored to its former name, Anqing Fu.

description.zh-cn: 康熙年间，江南省被分设为安徽省和江苏省。
description.en: During the Kangxi Emperor's reign, Jiangnan Province was divided into Anhui and Jiangsu provinces.

description.zh-cn: 作为“废府州厅改县”改革的一部分，安庆府于1913年被废除。
description.en: As part of the 'Abolition of Fu, Zhou, and Ting for Counties' reform, Anqing Fu was abolished in 1913.

description.zh-cn: “安徽省”的省名来源于“安庆府”和“徽州府”的首字。
description.en: The name of 'Anhui Province' is derived from the first characters of 'Anqing Fu' and 'Huizhou Fu'.

description.zh-cn: “安徽省”的省名来源于“安庆府”和“徽州府”的首字。
description.en: The name of 'Anhui Province' is derived from the first characters of 'Anqing Fu' and 'Huizhou Fu'.

description.zh-cn: 清朝初年，安庆府隶属于江南省。
description.en: In the early Qing Dynasty, Anqing Fu was subordinate to Jiangnan Province.

description.zh-cn: 江南分省后，安庆府隶属于安徽省。
description.en: After the division of Jiangnan, Anqing Fu became subordinate to Anhui Province.

description.zh-cn: 安庆府下辖县之一。
description.en: One of the counties under the jurisdiction of Anqing Fu.

description.zh-cn: 安庆府下辖县之一。
description.en: One of the counties under the jurisdiction of Anqing Fu.

description.zh-cn: 安庆府下辖县之一。
description.en: One of the counties under the jurisdiction of Anqing Fu.

description.zh-cn: 安庆府下辖县之一。
description.en: One of the counties under the jurisdiction of Anqing Fu.

description.zh-cn: 安庆府下辖县之一。
description.en: One of the counties under the jurisdiction of Anqing Fu.

description.zh-cn: 安庆府下辖县之一。
description.en: One of the counties under the jurisdiction of Anqing Fu.

description.zh-cn: 安庆府是安徽巡抚的驻地。
description.en: Anqing Fu was the official residence of the Governor of Anhui.

description.zh-cn: 安庆府是清朝安徽省的省治（省会）。
description.en: Anqing Fu was the provincial capital of Anhui Province during the Qing Dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 安庆府的治所（政府驻地）于1195年至1260年间设在怀宁县。
description.en: The seat of government of Anqing Fu was located in Huaining County from 1195 to 1260.

description.zh-cn: 自1260年起，安庆府的治所（政府驻地）设在今安庆市。
description.en: From 1260 onwards, the seat of government of Anqing Fu was located in modern-day Anqing City.

description.zh-cn: 潜山市是历史上怀宁县的所在地。
description.en: Qianshan City is the location of the historical Huaining County.
